text: I’m seeing a long lag between the julia-buildpkg step finishing and the julia-runtest step starting: <https://github.com/ericphanson/TrackingTimers.jl/runs/1999687418?check_suite_focus=true>. Has anyone seen this? It’s not consistent, e.g. other runs on the same OS/arch don’t have this issue, but a bunch of my runs for this package are hanging like this

text: You didn't cancel the job, did you? I still see it running. I'd also put a reasonable timeout, to avoid rogue jobs piling up the queue

text: I'm suggesting to cancel the job because perhaps the log will show some useful information. While the job is running you may not see anything
